controller Module¶

controller Module¶

class controller.LanguageDetectorController¶

Bases: PyQt5.QtWidgets.QMainWindow

The Controller combining the GUI and the model.

__init__()¶

Initialization of the UI and the REST Client

clear()¶

Clears input and output fields

submit()¶

Sets the address and port for the REST Client form the input fields, makes an request according to the input data and sets the output field.
